name: vulture
description: A light front-end framework based around the fast virtual DOM.
author: Caleb Meredith <calebmeredith8@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build-max && npm run build-min
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm test && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Rebuild browser distributable' && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm test && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Rebuild browser distributable' && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm test && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Rebuild browser distributable' && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
